org.fujion.event

Class EventUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.event.EventUtil

  • public class EventUtil
extends Object
    Static methods for manipulating events.

    • Method Detail

      • send

        public static void send(Event event)
        Sends an event to its designated target.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to send. If the event's designated target is null, the event is sent to the page in the current execution context.

      • send

        public static void send(Event event,
                        BaseComponent target)
        Sends an event to the specified target.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to send.
        target - The target for the event. If the target is null, the event is sent to the page in the current execution context.

      • send

        public static Event send(String eventName,
                         BaseComponent target,
                         Object data)
        Creates and sends an event to the specified target.
        Parameters:
        eventName - The event name.
        target - The event target.
        data - Optional event data.
        Returns:
        The newly created event.

      • echo

        public static void echo(Event event)
        Echo an event. This is similar to a post, but defers event delivery until the client responds to a dummy invocation. It simulates an event roundtrip from server to client and back, though the event itself never leaves the server.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to send. If the event's designated target is null, the event is sent to the page in the current execution context.

      • post

        public static void post(Event event)
        Queues an event for later processing.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to queue.

      • post

        public static void post(Page page,
                        Event event)
        Queues an event for later processing.
        Parameters:
        page - Page owning the target queue.
        event - The event to queue.

      • post

        public static Event post(String eventName,
                         BaseComponent target,
                         Object data)
        Creates and posts an event for later delivery.
        Parameters:
        eventName - The event name.
        target - The event target.
        data - Optional event data.
        Returns:
        The newly created event.

      • post

        public static Event post(Page page,
                         String eventName,
                         BaseComponent target,
                         Object data)
        Creates and posts an event for later delivery.
        Parameters:
        page - Page owning the target queue.
        eventName - The event name.
        target - The event target.
        data - Optional event data.
        Returns:
        The newly created event.

      • getEventClass

        public static Class<? extends Event> getEventClass(String eventType)
        Returns the implementation class for the specified event type. If there is no implementation specific to the event type, the Event class will be returned.
        Parameters:
        eventType - The event type (with or without the "on" prefix).
        Returns:
        The implementation class for the event type (never null).

      • getEventType

        public static String getEventType(Class<? extends Event> eventClass)
        Returns the event type given the implementation class.
        Parameters:
        eventClass - The event class.
        Returns:
        The corresponding event type, or null if none.

      • stripOn

        public static String stripOn(String eventType)
        Strips the "on" prefix from an event type, if one is present.
        Parameters:
        eventType - The event type.
        Returns:
        The event type stripped of the "on" prefix.

      • invokeHandler

        public static boolean invokeHandler(String handlerName,
                                    Object instance,
                                    Event event)
        Invokes an event handler.
        Parameters:
        handlerName - The name of the handler method.
        instance - The instance implementing the handler method.
        event - The event.
        Returns:
        True if the event was handled.

      • getHandler

        public static Method getHandler(String handlerName,
                                Object instance,
                                Event event)
        Returns a suitable handler method for an event. First, it searches for a method with a single argument that assignment-compatible with the event. Failing that, it searches for a method with no arguments. Failing that, it returns null.
        Parameters:
        handlerName - The name of the handler method (defaults to a method with the same name as the event type).
        instance - The instance implementing the handler method.
        event - The event.
        Returns:
        The handler method, or null if a suitable method could not be found.

      • hasEvent

        public static boolean hasEvent(ClientRequest request)
        Returns true if the client request contains an event.
        Parameters:
        request - The client request.
        Returns:
        True if the request contains an event.

      • hasEvent

        public static boolean hasEvent(ClientRequest request,
                               String eventType)
        Returns true if the client request contains an event of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        request - The client request.
        eventType - The event type.
        Returns:
        True if the request contains an event of the specified type.

      • toEvent

        public static Event toEvent(ClientRequest request)
        Extracts an event from the client request.
        Parameters:
        request - The client request.
        Returns:
        The extracted event.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the request does not contain an event.

      • getEventType

        public static String getEventType(ClientRequest request)
        Extracts the event type from the client request.
        Parameters:
        request - The client request.
        Returns:
        The event type.

      • toEvent

        public static Event toEvent(String eventType)
        Creates an event from the specified event type. If an event class exists for the specified type, will create an event of that class. Otherwise, will create a generic event.
        Parameters:
        eventType - The event type.
        Returns:
        The newly created event.

      • toEvent

        public static Event toEvent(String eventType,
                            BaseComponent target,
                            Object data)
        Creates an event from the specified event type. If an event class exists for the specified type, will create an event of that class. Otherwise, will create a generic event.
        Parameters:
        eventType - The event type.
        target - The target of the event (may be null).
        data - Data to be associated with the event (may be null).
        Returns:
        The newly created event.

      • getOriginalEvent

        public static Event getOriginalEvent(Event event)
        Returns original event in a chain of forwarded events.
        Parameters:
        event - The event to inspect.
        Returns:
        The original event in the forwarded event chain.
